Detailed Description

MGCommandDrawer is a utility class fo MGOpenGLView class.

Using MGOpenGLView's attach_drawer(), users can draw some pictures in the MGOpenGLView as highest priority ones. That is the pictures are drawn last after hilighted pictures. MGCommandDrawer is designed for GL6 command as a tool to draw some pictures of the commands.
